adverbs.description: tactually (comparative more tactually, superlative most tactually)

entries.meaning: In a tactual manner; by, or relating to, the sense of touch.
examples: We have seen, again and again, that patients’ own kinetic melodies can be given back to them, albeit briefly, by the use of an appropriate flow of music  […] . Other ‘natural’ motions of Nature and Art are equally potent if experienced visually or tactually.
